aboutme: I am a passionate full-stack developer with 3 years of professional experience. Programming is my passion, and I love solving complex problems and thinking outside the box. I enjoy coding in my free time, constantly learning and exploring new technologies. I have a professional background desktop development, with hobby projects created in web and game engines. Check out my portfolio for a showcase of my experience and projects.
name: Jean Phillips
exp_jaix_jobs: General development on and porting of legacy VB.NET modules into C# of a Warehousing application
Utilised Model View View Model (MVVM) design patterns for modular and reusable UI
Helped transition into an event driven architecture using MassTransit, RabbitMQ and Docker
Led full-stack development on an integration between inventory and freight modules
